item.description:
@lord0ftacos wrote:

Hello, Iâ€™m currently adding more commands for my admins and developers. I was adding a zerk command that gives you beserker stats, (45def, 80 att, 99 str, 99hp, 99ranged, 99mage, 99 dung etc)
This was my code:

if (cmd[0].equalsIgnoreCase("zerk")) { player.getSkills().set(0, 80); player.getSkills().set(2, 99); player.getSkills().set(1, 45); player.getSkills().set(4, 99); player.getSkills().set(5, 95); player.getSkills().set(6, 99); player.getSkills().set(24, 80); player.getSkills().set(10, 99);

How many I make it so it doesnt add a potion effect kind of thing if they are already 99 attack for example. It changes it to 99/80. How do I make it set at just 80/80?
